Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_v8tn34ss&referenceId=61c42c2cb33a5f001476b64d_B31&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: Look for an end to the cult of revenue and another milestone for Microsoft. As net-zero efforts falter, investors ready a Plan B. Riyadh becomes strangely appealing. The World Cup pays dividends for the Gulf. And chips become Taiwan’s green calling card. Our columnists explain. <br /><hr><p style='color:grey; font-size:0.75em;'> See <a style='color:grey;' target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' href='https://acast.com/privacy'>acast.com/privacy</a> for privacy and opt-out information.</p>
